# Run targets

```{r include=FALSE}
#knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

Data processing and model running is controlled by `targets`. Targets are only re-run if the upstream data source changes

```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(targets)
library(tarchetypes)
library(visNetwork)
```

Update all targets
```{r, warning=FALSE}
tar_make()
```

Test that we can read in a target
```{r}
str(tar_read(envDataWB_Target))
```

Visualize the targets network
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tar_visnetwork()
```
